title: Stock Alert
welcomeText: Hello, this is your Stock Alert service!
companyIndexTitle: Select your company index you would like to follow
amountTitle: Set the minimum price limit. Under this price the alarm will be triggered
previewTitle: Pick your company index and see preview
refreshRate: Data presented on the widget will be downloaded every 15 minutes after the first configuration. The exact time of data collection will be shown inline with service title on the widget in dashboard. Data provided by IEX Cloud
lampNotificationContent: Whenever the selected stock value goes below the minimum price limit, your connected lamp will notify you by turning on red.
lackDevices: You have no supported devices. You can preview stock data on the widget in dashboard.
apiKeyTitle: Please fill your unique API key
apiKeyLink: Click here to get your free API key
subscribeFirst: You have to subscribe to the service to see actual data
